title: Home
content: Home node ACCESS PAST EXAM PAPERS ACCESS PAST EXAM PAPERS In some disciplines, examination papers from previous years are available in the libraries. These documents cannot generally be borrowed, but can be consulted on site. Exam papers in law, economics and management You can fin the exam papers in law, economics and management on E-campus  : https://ecampus.paris-saclay.fr/ Specific healthcare access course (PASS) exam papers aSpecific healthcare access course (PASS) exam papers are available at the reception of the Orsay University Library. To consult them, please speak with the librarian. Sports science exam papers You can fin the exam papers in sport sciences on E-campus  : https://ecampus.paris-saclay.fr/
